Package com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.model

Class Mailbox

java.lang.Object
com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.model.Mailbox
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Mailbox extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a mail box with a map of Local Date associated with a message list.
Author:
Valerio Morelli

  • Method Details

    • getMailbox

      public TreeMap<LocalDate,ArrayList<Message>> getMailbox()
      Returns:
      the mail box map

    • sendMessage

      public Mailbox sendMessage(Message message)
      Puts a message in the mail box if it contains the current time key. If not, it inserts the current time and add the respective message.
      Parameters:
      message - to insert in the mail box
      Returns:
      mail box with new message

    • sendMessage

      public Mailbox sendMessage(Message message, LocalDate date)
      Puts a message in the mail box in a specific date given as a parameter. If the mail box already contains date it simply inserts the message to that date. If not, it inserts date and add the respective message.
      Parameters:
      message - to insert in the mail box
      date - in which insert message
      Returns:
      mail box with new message

    • save

      public void save(String token)
      Saves the user's mail box through token to local database in mail box directory "mailbox/".
      Parameters:
      token - user's token
